source.title: Liliaceae

leads.lead_text: Perianth segments with green stripes; ovary green or yellow pigmented
Perianth segments without green stripes; ovary black-violet or purple pigmented
Pedicels to 4 cm long; all stamen filaments linear to lanceolate, without appendages
Pedicels 6–8 cm long; stamen filaments opposite perianth segments broadened, with appendage
